prompt: I spotted a lost dog in the village square. I had to decide what to do.

options.outcome: I searched for the dog's owner and reunited them. The villagers praised my kindness.

options.text: Keep the dog as a companion.
options.outcome: I decided to keep the dog. Now I have a loyal friend by my side.
options.successOutcome: I decided to keep the dog. Now I have a loyal friend by my side.
failureOutcomes: The dog seemed annoyed with my very presence and ran down the street.

The dog looked at me confused, walked up to me, I bent down to pet him. He pressed his mouth to my ear, said something crazily racist about Sharkmen and then ran down the street. I was too stunned to move. A talking dog... a racist talking dog.

options.outcome: I ignored the dog and continued on my way. Maybe someone else will help.
I fed the dog. It wagged its tail and followed me for a while.

prompt: The young adventurer notices a mysterious cat watching them from a rooftop. What do they do?

options.outcome: I tried to approach the cat, but it leapt away gracefully, disappearing into the alley.
I offered the cat some food. It jumped down, ate, and rubbed against my leg before vanishing.
I ignored the cat and continued on my way, but I felt its eyes on me for a while.

options.text: Try to mimic the cat's movements.
options.outcome: I tried to mimic the cat's movements. It seemed amused and watched me for a moment then said 'No one will ever believe you.' It then bit me and ran away.

prompt: The young adventurer discovers a strange, glowing coin lying in the middle of the road. What do they do?

options.outcome: I picked up the coin. It felt warm in my hand and I suddenly felt a little luckier.
I decided to leave the coin where it was. Sometimes it's best not to mess with mysterious things.

options.text: Show the coin to a nearby merchant.
options.outcome: I showed the coin to a merchant. They gasped and offered me a rare item in exchange.
I buried the coin under a tree, marking the spot. Maybe I'll return for it one day.

prompt: A traveling merchant has set up shop in the town square with exotic goods from distant lands.

options.outcome: I spent time browsing the merchant's exotic goods. The stories of distant lands fascinated me.
I asked the merchant about their travels. They shared tales of distant kingdoms and strange creatures.

options.text: Try to haggle for a better price.
options.outcome: I tried to haggle with the merchant. They seemed impressed by my negotiation skills.

options.text: Offer to help set up their stall.
options.outcome: I helped the merchant set up their stall. They gave me a small trinket as thanks.

prompt: The village is hosting a festival today with games, food, and entertainment.

options.outcome: I joined in the festival games and had a wonderful time with the other villagers.
I tried various festival foods. The local delicacies were delicious and unique.
I watched the festival entertainment. The performers were skilled and entertaining.
I helped organize the festival. The villagers appreciated my assistance.

prompt: I heard a strange noise coming from the old abandoned house on the edge of town.

options.outcome: I investigated the noise and found a family of raccoons had made the house their home.
I decided to ignore the noise. Sometimes it's better not to investigate mysterious sounds.

options.text: Tell the town guard about it.
options.outcome: I reported the noise to the town guard. They thanked me for being vigilant.
I gathered some friends to investigate together. We found nothing dangerous, just some wildlife.

prompt: A wise sage has stopped in town and is offering to share knowledge with anyone who seeks it.

options.outcome: I asked the sage for wisdom. Their advice was profound and gave me new perspective.
I asked the sage about distant lands. Their stories of faraway places were fascinating.
I asked the sage about my future. Their guidance was thoughtful and encouraging.
I shared my experiences with the sage. They seemed impressed by my perspective.

prompt: I found an old, weathered map in the town library that seems to lead to a hidden location.

options.outcome: I followed the map and discovered an old, forgotten shrine with ancient inscriptions.
I researched the map's origins in the library. It led to fascinating historical discoveries.

options.text: Share the map with a scholar.
options.outcome: I shared the map with a local scholar. They were excited by the historical significance.

options.text: Keep the map for future exploration.
options.outcome: I decided to keep the map for future exploration. It might lead to adventure one day.
